timeline.bodyText:
i'm not 100% sure what this AD_SysConfig does..
it's used in HUEditorViewFactoryTemplate, which has five other subclasses, besides ServiceHUEditorViewFactory...
❓ ...so, in other words: are we sure this doesn't meddle in bad ways with other HU-Editors?
Also, please consider adding a description to this AD_SysConfig (->boyscout rule)
timeline.author: metas-ts
